dashboard.label: COMMON WEAKNESS ENUMERATION (CWE) VIEW
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_mRfzguZd":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"columnFormat":{"CVSS":{"data":"> table | seriesByName("CVSS") | formatByType(CVSSColumnFormatEditorConfig)","rowColors":"> table | seriesByName('CVSS') | rangeValue(CVSSRowColorsEditorConfig)"}}},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_CWE_chart"},"context":{"CVSSColumnFormatEditorConfig":{"number":{"thousandSeparated":false,"unitPosition":"after"}},"CVSSRowColorsEditorConfig":[{"value":"#D41F1F","to":6},{"value":"#cba700","from":6,"to":8},{"value":"#d94e17","from":8,"to":9},{"value":"#d41f1f","from":9}]}},"viz_huBUWfcp":{"type":"splunk.table","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_cwe_split_donut"},"showProgressBar":false,"showLastUpdated":false,"options":{},"context":{}}},"dataSources":{"ds_CWE_chart":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup ics_cert_project_lookup 
| strcat "https://www.cisa.gov/uscert/ics/advisories/" ICS-CERT_Number ics_cert_link
| eval CWE-ID = ltrim(CWE_Number,"CWE-") 
| lookup software_development_cwe CWE-ID outputnew Description 
| lookup hardware_design_cwe CWE-ID outputnew Description 
| lookup research_concepts_cwe CWE-ID outputnew Description 
| rename ICS-CERT_Number as "ICS-CERT Number", ICS-CERT_Advisory_Title as "ICS-CERT Advisory Title", ics_cert_link as "Link to CISA ICS-CERT Advisory", Cumulative_CVSS as "CVSS" CVSS_Severity as "Severity"
| streamstats count as "#" 
| table "#" "ICS-CERT Number" Vendor Product "ICS-CERT Advisory Title" CVSS "Severity" "Link to CISA ICS-CERT Advisory"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"CWE_chart"},"ds_cwe_split_donut":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup ics_cert_project_lookup 
| strcat "https://www.cisa.gov/uscert/ics/advisories/" ICS-CERT_Number ics_cert_link
| eval CWE-ID = ltrim(CWE_Number,"CWE-") 
| lookup software_development_cwe CWE-ID outputnew Description 
| lookup hardware_design_cwe CWE-ID outputnew Description 
| lookup research_concepts_cwe CWE-ID outputnew Description 
| eval "CWE Description" = CWE_Number.": ".Description
| stats count by "CWE Description"
| sort - count
| streamstats count as "#"
| table "#" "CWE Description" count","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"count_by_cwe"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}},"inputs":{},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","backgroundColor":"#202124","width":2400,"height":1200},"structure":[{"item":"viz_mRfzguZd","type":"block","position":{"x":30,"y":770,"w":2310,"h":410}},{"item":"viz_huBUWfcp","type":"block","position":{"x":1580,"y":250,"w":760,"h":480}}],"globalInputs":[]},"description":"","title":"COMMON WEAKNESS ENUMERATION (CWE) VIEW"}
